Route Travelled

##
ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^City of", "", area)) %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^\\s+", "", area))

# combining location coordinates with ping activity
ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  left_join(OceanusLocations_df %>% select(c("Name", "XCOORD", "YCOORD")),
            by = c("area" = "Name"))

vessel_movement_sf <- ping_activity %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("XCOORD", "YCOORD"), 
           crs = 4326)

vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  arrange(vessel_id, start_time)

#write_csv(vessel_movement_sf, "data/vessel_movement.csv")

# Getting median dwell time statistics 
vessel_movement_sf$start_time <- as.POSIXct(vessel_movement_sf$start_time, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")

vessel_movement_sf2 <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  group_by(vessel_id, area, geometry) %>%
  summarise(median_dwell_time = median(dwell, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'vessel_id', 'area'. You can override using
the `.groups` argument.
# Deriving vessel trajectory
vessel_trajectory <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  group_by(vessel_id) %>%
  summarize(do_union = FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")


## re-stringing routes
OceanusLocations_df <- OceanusLocations_df %>%
  mutate(XCOORD = as.numeric(XCOORD), YCOORD = as.numeric(YCOORD))

remove_city_of <- function(text) {
  gsub("City of ", "", text, fixed = TRUE)
}

time_summary_df <- time_summary_df %>% mutate(list_of_areas = sapply(list_of_areas, remove_city_of))

time_summary_expanded <- time_summary_df %>%
  separate_rows(list_of_areas, sep = ",")

# Trim whitespace from list_of_areas after splitting
time_summary_expanded$list_of_areas <- trimws(time_summary_expanded$list_of_areas)

# Merge coordinates with the expanded trip summary
vessel_routes <- time_summary_expanded %>%
  left_join(OceanusLocations_df, by = c("list_of_areas" = "Name"))

vessel_routes <- vessel_routes %>%
  filter(!is.na(XCOORD) & !is.na(YCOORD))

# Group by vessel_id and trip_id and create LINESTRING
vessel_trajectory2 <- vessel_routes %>%
  select(vessel_id, trip_id, XCOORD, YCOORD) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("XCOORD", "YCOORD"), crs = 4326)

# Create LINESTRING from points
vessel_trajectory3 <- vessel_trajectory2 %>%
  group_by(vessel_id, trip_id) %>%
  summarize(geometry = st_combine(geometry)) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'vessel_id'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
# Join with the main dataset
vessel_trajectory_time <- time_summary_df %>%
  left_join(vessel_trajectory3, by = c("vessel_id", "trip_id")) %>% select(-c(unique_areas))


# Convert vessel_trajectory_time to an sf object if it isn't already
if (!inherits(vessel_trajectory_time, "sf")) {
  vessel_trajectory_time <- st_as_sf(vessel_trajectory_time)
}

# Check and set CRS for oceanusgeography if missing
if (is.na(st_crs(OceanusGeography))) {
  OceanusGeography <- st_set_crs(OceanusGeography, 4326)  # Assuming WGS 84
}

# Check and set CRS for vessel_trajectory_time if missing
if (is.na(st_crs(vessel_trajectory_time))) {
  vessel_trajectory_time <- st_set_crs(vessel_trajectory_time, 4326)  # Assuming WGS 84
}

# Ensure CRS is consistent
OceanusGeography <- st_transform(OceanusGeography, crs = st_crs(vessel_trajectory_time))
vessel_trajectory_time <- st_transform(vessel_trajectory_time, crs = st_crs(OceanusGeography))

# Check for and handle invalid geometries
OceanusGeography <- st_make_valid(OceanusGeography)
vessel_trajectory_time <- st_make_valid(vessel_trajectory_time)

vessel_trajectory_time <- vessel_trajectory_time %>% left_join(N_vessel, by = c("vessel_id" = "vessel_id"))

library(shinyjs)

The following object is masked from 'package:shiny':

    runExample

# UI definition

shinyApp(ui <- fluidPage(
  useShinyjs(),  # Initialize shinyjs
  titlePanel("Vessel Route Plotter"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderInput("dateRange", "Select date range:",
                  min = as.Date(min(vessel_trajectory_time$start_date)),
                  max = as.Date(max(vessel_trajectory_time$end_date)),
                  value = c(as.Date("2035-02-01"), as.Date("2035-03-03")),
                  timeFormat = "%Y-%m-%d"),
      selectInput("vessel1", "Select first vessel (Red):", choices = c("", unique(vessel_trajectory_time$vessel_name)), 
                  selected = "Albacore Angler"),
      textOutput("vessel1_company"),
      br(),
      selectInput("vessel2", "Select second vessel (Blue):", choices = c("", unique(vessel_trajectory_time$vessel_name)), 
                  selected = "Bigeye Tuna Bandit"),
      textOutput("vessel2_company"),
      br(),
      selectInput("vessel3", "Select third vessel (Green):", choices = c("", unique(vessel_trajectory_time$vessel_name)), 
                  selected = "Salmon Snatcher"),
      textOutput("vessel3_company"),
      br(),
      actionButton("play", "Next"),
      actionButton("pause", "Pause"),
      width = 3
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("mapPlot", height = "800px"),
      width = 9
    )
  )
),

# Server logic
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  # Initialize reactive values for autoplay
  rv <- reactiveValues(play = FALSE, dateRange = c(as.Date("2035-02-01"), as.Date("2035-03-03")))
  
  # Update the date range based on slider input
  observe({
    rv$dateRange <- input$dateRange
  })
  
  # Observe play button
  observeEvent(input$play, {
    rv$play <- TRUE
    run_autoplay()
  })
  
  # Observe pause button
  observeEvent(input$pause, {
    rv$play <- FALSE
  })
  
  # Autoplay function
  run_autoplay <- reactive({
    invalidateLater(1000, session)  # Change interval to 1 second
    isolate({
      if (rv$play) {
        new_end <- rv$dateRange[2] + 30
        new_start <- rv$dateRange[1] + 30
        if (new_end > as.Date(max(vessel_trajectory_time$end_date))) {
          rv$play <- FALSE
        } else {
          updateSliderInput(session, "dateRange", value = c(new_start, new_end))
        }
      }
    })
  })
  
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    vessel_trajectory_time %>%
      filter(start_date >= rv$dateRange[1] & end_date <= rv$dateRange[2])
  })
  
  output$vessel1_company <- renderText({
    req(input$vessel1)
    vessel_company <- vessel_trajectory_time %>% 
      filter(vessel_name == input$vessel1) %>% 
      select(vessel_company.y) %>% 
      distinct() %>% 
      slice(1) %>% 
      pull(vessel_company.y)
    paste("Vessel Company:", vessel_company)
  })
  
  output$vessel2_company <- renderText({
    req(input$vessel2)
    vessel_company <- vessel_trajectory_time %>% 
      filter(vessel_name == input$vessel2) %>% 
      select(vessel_company.y) %>% 
      distinct() %>% 
      slice(1) %>% 
      pull(vessel_company.y)
    paste("Vessel Company:", vessel_company)
  })
  
  output$vessel3_company <- renderText({
    req(input$vessel3)
    vessel_company <- vessel_trajectory_time %>% 
      filter(vessel_name == input$vessel3) %>% 
      select(vessel_company.y) %>% 
      distinct() %>% 
      slice(1) %>% 
      pull(vessel_company.y)
    paste("Vessel Company:", vessel_company)
  })
  
  output$mapPlot <- renderPlot({
    ggplot() +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, fill = NA, color = "black", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, aes(fill = X.Kind), alpha = 0.3) +
      theme_minimal() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = c("Island" = "beige", "Fishing Ground" = "lightblue", 
                                   "Ecological Preserve" = "lightgreen", "city" = "purple", "buoy" = "darkblue")) +
      geom_text(data = OceanusLocations_df, 
                aes(x = XCOORD, y = YCOORD, label = Name), 
                size = 4, fontface = "bold", color = "black", hjust = 1, vjust = 1) + 
      labs(title = "Map of Oceanus", 
           x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude", fill = "Type") +
      {if (input$vessel1 != "") geom_sf(data = filtered_data() %>% filter(vessel_name == input$vessel1), color = "red", size = 2, alpha = 1)} +
      {if (input$vessel2 != "") geom_sf(data = filtered_data() %>% filter(vessel_name == input$vessel2), color = "blue", size = 1.5, alpha = 0.6)} +
      {if (input$vessel3 != "") geom_sf(data = filtered_data() %>% filter(vessel_name == input$vessel3), color = "green", size = 1, alpha = 0.3)}
  })
})

Dwell Time

ping_activity <- read_csv("data/ping_activity.csv")
Rows: 258542 Columns: 16
 Column specification 
Delimiter: ","
chr  (10): last_edited_by, area, vessel_id, Activities, kind, fish_species_p...
dbl   (3): dwell, tonnage, length_overall
dttm  (3): start_time, date_added, last_edited_date

 Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
 Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
# defining vessel trajectory
ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^City of", "", area)) %>%
  mutate(area = gsub("^\\s+", "", area))

# combining location coordinates with ping activity
ping_activity <- ping_activity %>%
  left_join(OceanusLocations_df %>% select(c("Name", "XCOORD", "YCOORD")),
            by = c("area" = "Name"))

# convert dataframe into point data.frame with x and y coords.

vessel_movement_sf <- ping_activity %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("XCOORD", "YCOORD"), 
           crs = 4326)

vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  arrange(vessel_id, start_time)

#write_csv(vessel_movement_sf, "data/vessel_movement.csv")

kind_colors <- c(
  "Island" = "beige", 
  "Fishing Ground" = "lightblue", 
  "Ecological Preserve" = "lightgreen", 
  "City" = "purple", 
  "Buoy(Fishing)" = "blue"
)

vessel_movement_sf$start_time <- as.POSIXct(vessel_movement_sf$start_time, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")

excluded_areas <- c("Haacklee", "Himark", "Lomark", "Paackland", "South Paackland", "Port Grove",
                    "Nav 1", "Nav 2", "Nav 3", "Nav A", "Nav B", "Nav C", "Nav D", "Nav E",
                    "Exit East", "Exit South", "Exit North", "Exit West")

# Preprocess the dataset to exclude specific areas for the boxplot
preprocessed_vessel_movement_sf <- vessel_movement_sf %>%
  filter(area %in% c("Cod Table", "Tuna Shelf", "Wrasse Beds", "Ghoti Preserve", "Nemo Reef", "Don Limpet Preserve") &
           !area %in% excluded_areas)

# Define UI for the application
shinyApp(ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Vessel Movement Median Dwell Time"),
  fluidRow(
    column(2,
           selectInput("vessel_name", "Select Vessel:", choices = unique(vessel_movement_sf$vessel_name)),
           textOutput("vessel_company"),
           sliderInput("dateRange", "Select Date Range:", 
                       min = min(vessel_movement_sf$start_time), 
                       max = max(vessel_movement_sf$start_time), 
                       value = c(as.POSIXct("2035-02-01"), as.POSIXct("2035-05-14")),
                       timeFormat = "%Y-%m-%d"),
           selectizeInput("excludeVessels", "Exclude Vessels from Boxplot:", 
                          choices = unique(vessel_movement_sf$vessel_name), 
                          selected = "Heart of Oceanus", 
                          multiple = TRUE),
           tags$div(style = "margin-top: 20px;",
                    tags$b("Color Scheme:"),
                    tags$div(style = "background-color: lightblue; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px;", "Fishing Ground"),
                    tags$div(style = "background-color: lightgreen; padding: 5px;", "Ecological Preserve"),
                    tags$b("Circle Sizes:"),
                    tags$div(style = "margin-top: 5px;",
                             tags$div(style = "display: flex; align-items: center;",
                                      tags$div(style = "width: 3px; height: 3px; background-color: red; border-radius: 50%; margin-right: 10px;"), 
                                      "Small: 0 - 50,000"),
                             tags$div(style = "display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 5px;",
                                      tags$div(style = "width: 5px; height: 5px; background-color: red; border-radius: 50%; margin-right: 10px;"), 
                                      "Medium: 50,001 - 100,000"),
                             tags$div(style = "display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 5px;",
                                      tags$div(style = "width: 10px; height: 10px; background-color: red; border-radius: 50%; margin-right: 10px;"), 
                                      "Large: 100,001 - 150,000"),
                             tags$div(style = "display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 5px;",
                                      tags$div(style = "width: 15px; height: 15px; background-color: red; border-radius: 50%; margin-right: 10px;"), 
                                      "Very Large: > 150,000")
                    )
           )
    ),
    column(5,
           plotOutput("dwellTimePlot", width = "100%", height = "600px")
    ),
    column(5,
           plotlyOutput("boxPlot", width = "100%", height = "600px")
    )
  )
),

server <- function(input, output) {
  selectedVessel <- reactive({
    vessel_movement_sf %>%
      filter(vessel_name == input$vessel_name) %>%
      select(vessel_name, vessel_company) %>%
      distinct()
  })
  
  desired_areas <- c("Cod Table", "Tuna Shelf", "Wrasse Beds", "Ghoti Preserve", "Nemo Reef", "Don Limpet Preserve")
  
  plotData <- reactive({
    vessel_movement_sf %>%
      filter(vessel_name == input$vessel_name, start_time >= input$dateRange[1], start_time <= input$dateRange[2]) %>%
      filter(area %in% desired_areas) %>%
      group_by(vessel_name, area, geometry) %>%
      summarise(median_dwell_time = median(dwell, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
      ungroup()
  })
  
  filteredDataForBoxplot <- reactive({
    preprocessed_vessel_movement_sf %>%
      filter(start_time >= input$dateRange[1], start_time <= input$dateRange[2]) %>%
      filter(!vessel_name %in% input$excludeVessels) %>%
      filter(area %in% desired_areas) %>%
      group_by(vessel_name, area, vessel_company) %>%
      summarise(median_dwell_time = median(dwell, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
      ungroup() %>%
      mutate(area = factor(area, levels = desired_areas))
  })
  
  output$vessel_company <- renderText({
    selected <- selectedVessel()
    if (nrow(selected) > 0) {
      paste("Company:", selected$vessel_company[1])
    } else {
      "Company: N/A"
    }
  })
  
  output$dwellTimePlot <- renderPlot({
    ggplot() +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, fill = NA, color = "black", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_sf(data = OceanusGeography, aes(fill = X.Kind), alpha = 0.3) +
      geom_point(data = plotData(), aes(x = st_coordinates(geometry)[,1], y = st_coordinates(geometry)[,2], size = median_dwell_time), color = "red", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_text_repel(data = plotData(), aes(x = st_coordinates(geometry)[,1], y = st_coordinates(geometry)[,2], label = area), size = 3) +
      theme_minimal() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = kind_colors) +
      labs(title = "Map of Oceanus", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude", fill = "Type") +
      theme(aspect.ratio = 1, legend.position = "none")
  })
  
  output$boxPlot <- renderPlotly({
    p <- ggplot() +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = 3.5, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "lightblue") +
      geom_rect(aes(xmin = 3.5, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf), fill = "lightgreen") +
      geom_boxplot(data = filteredDataForBoxplot(), aes(x = area, y = median_dwell_time)) +
      geom_jitter(data = filteredDataForBoxplot(), aes(x = area, y = median_dwell_time, text = paste("Vessel Name:", vessel_name, "<br>Company:", vessel_company, "<br>Median Dwell Time:", comma(round(median_dwell_time)))), color = "blue", alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_point(data = plotData(), aes(x = area, y = median_dwell_time), color = "red", size = 3) + # Highlight selected vessel's median dwell time
      geom_vline(xintercept = 3.5, linetype = "dashed", color = "darkgreen") + # Adds a vertical line between Wrasse Beds and Ghoti Preserve
      theme_minimal() +
      labs(title = "Boxplot of Median Dwell Time", x = "Area", y = "Median Dwell Time") +
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8), 
            axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8),
            axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10),
            axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10),
            plot.title = element_text(size = 10, hjust = 0.5)) +
      scale_x_discrete(labels = scales::wrap_format(10)) # Adjust the number to control wrap length
    ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
  })
})
Warning: In sliderInput(): `value` should be greater than or equal to `min`
(value = 2035-02-01, 2035-05-14, min = 2035-02-01).

Vessel Cargo Mapping

tx_company <- nearest_tx_date %>% left_join(N_vessel, by = c("vessel_id" = "vessel_id"))

tx_company <- tx_company %>%
  left_join(N_fish %>% select(fish_id, fish_name), by = c("fish_species" = "fish_id"))

shinyApp(ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Network Graph of Vessel ID to Cargo ID"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      dateRangeInput("tx_date", "Transaction Date Range:",
                     start = min(tx_company$tx_date), end = max(tx_company$tx_date)),
      selectInput("dest", "Destination:", choices = c("All", unique(tx_company$dest)), selected = "City of Paackland"),
      selectInput("fish_name", "Fish Name:", choices = c("All", unique(tx_company$fish_name)), selected = "All"),
      selectInput("vessel_company", "Vessel Company:", choices = c("All", unique(tx_company$vessel_company)), selected = "SouthSeafood Express Corp"),
      br(),
      h4("Fish Species Color Code", style = "font-size: 10px;"),
      do.call(tagList, lapply(names(fish_species_color), function(species) {
        div(style = sprintf("background-color:%s; color: black; font-size: 10px; padding: 5px;", fish_species_color[[species]]),
            species)
      }))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      visNetworkOutput("network"),
      dataTableOutput("data_table")
    )
  )
),

# Server
server <- function(input, output) {
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    data <- tx_company
    if (input$dest != "All") {
      data <- data %>% filter(dest == input$dest)
    }
    if (input$fish_name != "All") {
      data <- data %>% filter(fish_name == input$fish_name)
    }
    if (input$vessel_company != "All") {
      # Now filtering to get all vessels under the selected company
      data <- data %>% filter(vessel_company == input$vessel_company)
    }
    data %>% filter(tx_date >= input$tx_date[1] & tx_date <= input$tx_date[2])
  })
  
  output$network <- renderVisNetwork({
    df <- filtered_data()
    if(nrow(df) == 0) {
      return(NULL)  # No data to display
    }
    
    edges <- df %>%
      select(vessel_id, cargo_id, days_diff) %>%
      rename(from = vessel_id, to = cargo_id) %>%
      mutate(color = ifelse(days_diff >= 7, "grey", "black"))
    
    cargo_nodes <- df %>%
      select(id = cargo_id, days_diff, qty_tons, fish_species, fish_name) %>%
      mutate(
        group = "cargo",
        color = fish_species_color[fish_species],
        size = qty_tons,
        label = paste(fish_name, "(", qty_tons, "tons)")  # Add fish species label with quantity
      )
    
    vessel_nodes <- df %>%
      select(id = vessel_id) %>%
      mutate(group = "vessel", color = "#00cccc", size = 15, label = id)  # Optionally add labels to vessel nodes too
    
    # Include all distinct nodes without filtering duplicates within groups
    nodes <- bind_rows(cargo_nodes, vessel_nodes) %>%
      distinct(id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
      select(id, group, color, size, label)  # Include label in the nodes data
    
    visNetwork(nodes, edges) %>%
      visEdges(arrows = "to") %>%
      visOptions(highlightNearest = TRUE, nodesIdSelection = TRUE) %>%
      visNodes(font = list(face = "Arial", color = "black", size = 12))  # Style the node labels
  })
  output$data_table <- renderDataTable({
    filtered_data() %>%
      select(tx_date, dest, vessel_id, cargo_id, fish_species, fish_name, qty_tons, vessel_company) # Select specific columns for the table
  })
})
